mapper.select: SELECT l.lecture_no lectureNo, l.lecture_name lectureName, lc.lecture_addr lectureAddr, GROUP_CONCAT(ld.lecture_day ORDER BY CASE ld.lecture_day WHEN '월' THEN 1 WHEN '화' THEN 2 WHEN '수' THEN 3 WHEN '목' THEN 4 WHEN '금' THEN 5 END ASC) lectureDay, l.lecture_time lectureTime, FORMAT(l.lecture_price, 0) lecturePrice FROM cart c JOIN member m ON c.user_id=m.member_id JOIN user u ON u.member_id=m.member_id JOIN lecture l ON c.lecture_no=l.lecture_no JOIN location lc ON l.location_no=lc.location_no JOIN lectureday ld ON l.lecture_no=ld.lecture_no WHERE m.member_id = #{userId} GROUP BY lectureNo
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE lecture_no=#{lectureNo} AND user_id=#{userId}
